effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Conductor's Wax Whistle

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to direct a Kobold Cart towards your target, sending a careening troop that collides with enemies, inflicting 992,786 Physical damage split between enemies impacted.

description: A hero's symbolic trophy, for the kobolds need not be summoned. The kobolds yearn for the catacombs.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 537,739 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 149,373 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
